@natan3996 Go into the Redist folder in the main directory. Go to the DirectX folder in that folder. Find a file called DXSETUP.exe install that, and the sound will work right as rain and clear as a bell.

first of all, great torrent, thank you mare89pzs.
what i did, first:
1) Mount the .iso file(i did it with PowerIso bcuz deamon wasn't recognizing any of my drives)
2)Follow through the installation of the game.(Run the mounted disc)
3)Install the update after the main install is done.
4)Crack the call of duty .exe's. (Both singleplayer and multiplayer, just for safe measures.)
5)Cut and paste the SteamClient.dll file from the Download folder to the installation directory for the game.
6)Within the installation directory for the actual game, in Redist>DirectX- run the DXSETUP.EXE to make sure directx is updated fully.
7)Play the game!
